extension.name: UI Experiment: Fancy Forms
extension.description: A collection of UI replacements for system-default selectboxes, button and inputs. *Warning*: it causes severe addiction!

media.item: Fancy Forms: A collection of UI replacements for system-default selectboxes, button and inputs.

releases.release: * Added `extension.meta.xml`. * The extension has been renamed "UI Experiment: Fancy Forms" (it was previously called "Better Forms").
